description.lang: FEATURES- Manual or remote on/off control and dimming from your mobile device or computer (when included to a Z-Wave gateway controller)- Z-Wave Plus with improved 500 chip for faster and safer wireless communication- Works with most high-quality DIMMABLE LED, CFL, and incandescent bulbs (20 Watts minimum required)- Based on universal command classes - supported by most Z-Wave controllers- May be associated and grouped with other Z-Wave devices for advanced home automation- Air-gap switch to power the dimmer off when changing light bulbs- Built-in Z-Wave signal repeater for a stronger and more reliable networkSPECIFICATIONSModel Number: ZEN24Z-Wave Signal Frequency: 908.42 MHzPower: 120 VAC, 60 HzMaximum Loads: 600W Single-gang, 500W Double-gang, 400W Triple-gang Incandescent, 150W CFL or LEDMinimum Load: 20W for LED and CFL bulbsRange: Up to 100 feet line of sight Operating Temperature: 32-104 F (0-40 C)Installation and Use: Indoor only

deviceDescription.productName: Zooz Z-Wave Plus Toggle Dimmer Switch

description.lang: Use it to change between 2 control modes. Mode 1 will turn the light on when you toggle the switch up, and turn it off when you toggle the switch down. Mode 2 will turn the light on when you toggle the switch down, and turn it off when you toggle the switch up.
Mode 1 (up for on, down for off)
Mode 2 (down for on, up for off)
